entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • Uninstalling .NET SDK 8.0.300 left empty directory that caused "[MSB4236] The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found." #41022
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk unable to authenticate to private DevOps NPM feed since 0.5.105-alpha #41017

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]Runing project failed with net9 preview 4 sdk after allowEnforceSignCI policy enabled. #41010

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #41031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip Test Blocking Codeflow #41029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41026
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #41016
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use exclusions that contain "src/<repo>" #41028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Flow through generated container image names to callers #41027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow through generated container image names to callers #40638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport PR to use latest MSBuild on core #40883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Update internal mac pool image label #40999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40932
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
